description: This is a market group on what Robert F. Kennedy Jr. will say during his address scheduled for Friday, August 23, 2024.

markets.description:
On August 21, RFK Jr.'s campaign announced that the candidate will address the nation on Friday, August 23, 2024. You can read more about that here: https://x.com/RobertKennedyJr/status/1826351609385025708

This market will resolve to "Yes" if RFK Jr. says "endorse" or "endorsement" during the specified address. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If the specified address is cancelled, or otherwise does not start by August 23, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "endorse" or "endorsement" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to declaring one's public approval or support of.

The resolution source will be the video of the address.
markets.question: Will RFK Jr. say "Endorse" during Friday address?
